author: Jake Baldino
description:
New leaks and rumors suggest both PS6 and the next Xbox hardware will be launching in 2027. ALSO - Konami doubles down on Silent Hill.

~~SOURCES~~

https://www.digitaltrends.com/gaming/leak-says-playstation-6-production-starts-2027-but-is-it-too-soon-for-you/

https://www.pushsquare.com/news/2025/10/ps6-could-be-less-than-half-the-price-of-microsofts-very-premium-next-gen-xbox

https://www.videogameschronicle.com/news/silent-hill-boss-says-konami-announced-three-games-at-once-to-show-it-was-committed-to-the-series-future/

https://www.ign.com/articles/silent-hill-2-remake-sales-hit-25-million-as-franchise-surpasses-10-million
title: PS6...in 2027?!
